page.title: 17 School Activities
page.content: At Fifth Avenue Junior High we have a wide range of activities. Every lunch time the library is open for girls to borrow books or to read. The computer room is also open most lunch times. There is an athleics club on two lunch times, one for 9-11 years and the other for 11-13 years. The 9-11's also have a gardening club and a junior choir. The 11-13's have a senior choir, an art club and keep fit. The top year also have a badminton club and a science club. I have made a wooden toy and done some glassblowing as well as working in the garden this year. Last year I was in{"Joseph and the {Amazing Technicolour Dreamcoat".} This was a musical show which we thought was fantastic.
